CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND( NOT( Do_Not_Call__c) ,NOT( Email_Opt_Out__c ) ,NOT( Out_of_Business__c) ,Benetrac_Indicator__c = false ,OR(ISBLANK( OpportunityTypes__c ),NOT(CONTAINS(OpportunityTypes__c ,"Merchant"))) ,OR(ISBLANK(SensitivityList__c ), NOT(CONTAINS( SensitivityList__c , "CC Processing"))) ,OR(ISBLANK(CadenceType__c),NOT(CONTAINS( CadenceType__c, "MS"))) ,NOT( National_Account__c ) ,NOT( Has_Merchant__c) ,ISBLANK( Bank_Name__c ) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) ) )
CustomField.label: Merchant Services Workable
